name: Monstermath
description:
Try to match the orientation of the oncoming cube before it gets to you!

Start the game by pressing 'space'.
The cube is rotated using the 'wasd'-keys as well as 'q' + 'e'.
Press 'spacebar' to reset game and 'alt' + 'F4' to quit.

Try to get as far as you can! The longer you play the more complex the rotations you have to perform get.

A game by Linnea, Marcus & Samuel.
Made with assets from:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/dice-d6-game-ready-pbr-200151
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simple-forest-pack-209273#...
